title: WalkWithMe
blurbText: Closed-circuit walk routing using NYC City Street Centerlines and Open Street Map data.

title: NYCHA Voter Turnout

title: Mapping Food Access in NYC

title: Michigan Eviction Case Filings and Neighborhood Characteristics in Urban and Rural Places
blurbText: A Michigan statewide analysis of eviction rates in relation to demographic, housing, and legal variables
